title: Dilshan confident of Sri Lanka bouncing back
content: Ahmedabad: Sri Lanka batsman Tillakaratne Dilshan is hopeful of his team’s comeback in the five-ODI series against India despite a crushing 169-run defeat in the first game at Cuttack on Sunday. The Sri Lankans, chasing a mammoth 364 to win, were rattled by fast bowlers Varun Aaron and Umesh Yadav at the start of their…
